long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your timestamps with this handy little tool.
No need to forget where you left off in that lengthy YouTube video anymore. Just click on the plus button in the player options and you can access that timestamp anytime using the extension.

Features:
- Easy to Use
- Fast and minimal package size
- Unobtrusive UI
- Easy way to track all the timestamps you have saved
- Theme based on your preference.

In case of issues, please open a ticket in GitHub.

Leave a star if you liked my work.
https://github.com/nirzon47/youtube-bookmark-extension/
